name: BCR-InnovX Accelerator
summary: The BCR-InnovX Accelerator supports startups with scaling ambitions at European and global levels, emphasizing a transparent application process and public exposure of the applications.
raw_text: BCR-InnovX Accelerator is an international accelerator focusing on companies with global scaling ambitions. The program requires applications to be submitted in English and emphasizes transparency in the evaluation process.
eligibility_criteria: Must be a company with scaling ambitions
Project descriptions must be in English
additional_notes: All files attached must not exceed 8MB, and any non-English applications will be disqualified.
